name: Balled It
description:
This is a 3d, casual platformer-type game in which you have to navigate the ball towards the win point in the shortest time possible.

Each level has a different time gap which can get you a GOLD, SILVER OR BRONZE timing.

The better timing you get, the more money you get.

**ADS WON'T WORK ON THE PC VERSION. TO PLAY THE GAME ON MOBILE, CLICK ON THE PLAYSTORE LINK AND YOU WILL BE DIRECTED THERE.

Hope you enjoy the game.
